Articles.Content: I was bored in KSP, so I decided to throw a truck into space, and land it on the moon. Sadly, I had to perform a refuelling mission because the darn thing didn't have enough fuel when I finally got it in orbit. It was also wobbly as hell upon the launch, as the CoM and the center of thrust were not inline.
This thing looks great fun Should have equipped it with a couple of small docking ports so you can use it to cart small payloads around on the Mun.
Now, we need a bus to take Kerbals around the Mun! And then do Desert Bus style charity livestreams.
If I launched up a bus, I'd make it like a school bus haha.

This thing looks great fun Should have equipped it with a couple of small docking ports so you can use it to cart small payloads around on the Mun.

I've tried something similar with regular rovers on the mun, ended up more like a space train than anything. Lots of disastrous train wrecks tho...

Edited December 21, 2014 by TheSandDuna
